name: TikTok Series / Playlists
primary_goal_vibe: Episodic learning or storytelling that encourages binge-watching and recurring viewing.
tone_preference: Consistent, educational, and focused. Still delivered with TikTok’s direct, fast style.

copy_guidelines.copy_best_practices: Each episode should clearly reference where it fits in the series (for example part 1, part 2). The caption should be consistent across episodes in structure and mention the series name or tag. Encourage viewers to watch previous or next parts.
copy_guidelines.caption_structure_hint: Line 1: series name or part indicator. Line 2: what this specific episode covers. Final line: CTA to watch other parts or follow the series.
copy_guidelines.recommended_caption_length: Short and consistent from episode to episode.
cta_examples: Watch part one on my profile
Save this series to follow all steps
Follow to get the next episode
Comment which part you want next
Check the playlist for all episodes

series_structure_guidelines.primary_role: Deliver a multi-part narrative or framework across several videos.
best_practices: Define a clear outcome for the full series
Keep episodes focused on one subtopic each
Use consistent visual and copy patterns
Include a series tag or naming convention

hashtags_mentions.recommended_hashtags: Include at least one consistent series hashtag, plus 2–4 topical hashtags.
hashtags_mentions.hashtag_strategy: Series hashtag acts as a unifier; topical hashtags still support discovery.
hashtags_mentions.mention_strategy: Tag collaborators or recurring guests if the series includes them.

technical_constraints.episode_duration_recommendation: 10–45 seconds per episode for most topics.
technical_constraints.visual_consistency_note: Maintain similar framing, styling, or intro pattern to build recognizability.
technical_constraints.playlist_usage: Group related videos into a playlist so viewers can watch in order.

required_elements: CTA pointing to other episodes or future parts
disallowed_practices: Random, unconnected videos labeled as a series
Episodes that cover too many topics at once
No guidance on where to start or what to watch next
